World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 3 月 18 日星期一下午 1:58:13 120
Chile's GDP slightly rises in Q4, beats annual forecastChile's economy experienced a slight expansion of 0.1% in the fourth quarter of 2023 compared to the previous quarter, according to data released by the country's central bank on Monday, a figure slightly below market consensus. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 12:23:05 GMT AJWS5L6YYRLBBOYQ5YALAUNA3A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/chiles-gdp-slightly-rises-q4-beats-annual-forecast-2024-03-18/Reuters世界美洲
Independent Russian vote monitor says election was a mockeryAn independent Russian vote monitoring group said on Monday that the presidential election that Vladimir Putin won in a landslide with nearly 90% of the vote was the most fraudulent and corrupt in the country's history. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 12:15:22 GMT EPX2THP2NZPXPBKMMSJI4OPPCE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/independent- Russian-vote-monitor-says-election-was-mockery-2024-03-18/Lucy Papachristou世界欧洲
Thailand details two New Zealand tourists for assaulting police officerTwo tourists from New Zealand were being held in prison in Thailand for allegedly assaulting a police officer on the resort island of Phuket, Thai authorities said. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 12:09:24 GMT 6GFNYZJY5JJNFCBAIKAJWIAFXE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-details-two-new-zealand-tourists-assaulting-police-officer-2024-03-18/Reuters世界亚太地区
UK still aims to begin migrant deportations to Rwanda in the spring, Sunak saysBritish Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said on Monday he still expects the government to begin deporting asylum seekers to Rwanda in the spring, maintaining the original timeline for the scheme which is currently being debated in parliament. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:58:55 GMT XGMNVDGA2NMODHGUK23WKFHWEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-still-aims-to-begin-migrant-deportations-rwanda-spring-sunak-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界英国
Morocco reports first legal cannabis harvest of 294 metric tonsMorocco's first legal cannabis harvest was 294 metric tons in 2023, after the country approved its cultivation and export for medicine and industrial uses, cannabis regulator ANRAC said. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:58:42 GMT 25YULQ7NLJLGFP5HY2BETSD3M4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/morocco-reports-first-legal-cannabis-harvest-294-metric-tons-2024-03-18/Ahmed Eljechtimi世界非洲
IAEA to help Iraq develop peaceful nuclear programme, agency head saysThe head of the International Atomic Energy Agency Rafael Grossi met Iraq's prime minister in Baghdad on Monday as part of a visit to help the country develop a peaceful nuclear programme. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:56:44 GMT YUMPEAMDZFPTLACSSFVHTUNAWM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iaea-help-iraq-develop-peaceful-nuclear-program-agency-head-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中东地区
Gambian lawmakers to vote on repealing female genital mutilation banGambian lawmakers were due on Monday to vote on a proposal to repeal a ban on female genital mutilation (FGM), which if approved would mark a rare setback for efforts to criminalise the practice. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:54:57 GMT 6S2JXGJSSRM3PM33SOLDER5GM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/gambian-lawmakers-vote-repealing-female-genital-mutilation-ban-2024-03-18/Reuters世界非洲
West decries Putin's landslide election win, China congratulates himWestern governments lined up on Monday to condemn Vladimir Putin's landslide election victory as unfair and undemocratic, but China and North Korea congratulated the veteran Russian leader on extending his rule by a further six years. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:53:08 GMT G4CUPH6R6VNPZFUZ53NJYLK7UA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/west-decries-putin-landslide-election-win-china-congratulates-him-2024-03-18/Matthias Williams世界欧洲
Mahsa Amini's death in Iran custody was 'unlawful', says UN missionA fact-finding mission mandated by the United Nations said on Monday the death of Mahsa Amini in custody of Iran's morality police was "unlawful" and caused by violence and that women in the country remain subjected to wide-ranging discrimination. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:32:58 GMT U5C5M4THMRMTVPMFM742BGP7YES https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/mahsa-aminis-death-iran-custody-was-illegal-says-a-mission-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中东地区
Spanish police arrest three over death of migrants thrown from boatSpanish police have arrested three people over the deaths of five migrants who were deliberately forced off a speedboat last November, just off an Atlantic ocean beach in Cadiz in southern Spain, the Interior Ministry said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:11:18 GMT C7OLVWP7BJLOXFUP6TZEDCRYIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spanish-police-arrest- Three-over-death-migrants-thrown-boat-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Famine expected by May in Gaza, says U.N.-backed reportFamine is expected between now and May in the north of the Gaza Strip, a U.N.-backed report said on Monday, after more than five months of war which have shattered the Palestinian territory, killed thousands and cut off supplies. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 11:08:32 GMT 6Y5PHLUJKFPR5HXMK3CTPF6TMU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/famine-expected-by-may-gaza-says-un-backed-report-2024-03-18/Aidan Lewis世界中东地区
